DA_Apple.short_description: A small, crisp fruit that restores health upon consumption.
DA_Apple.long_description: Seemingly nothing more than a mundane piece of produce, this crimson fruit holds a subtle enchantment that nurtures the body when eaten. Legends whisper that these apples grow in sacred orchards once tended by benevolent spirits, imbuing them with an inherent restorative power. Despite their humble appearance, they have saved many a weary traveler from the brink of death.
DA_Apple.on_use_description: Instantly restores 10% of your maximum health.

DA_BossMace.short_description: A colossal mace infused with the smoldering essence of its fallen creator, capable of crushing foes' stances quickly with devastating blows.
DA_BossMace.long_description: Forged from obsidian steel and bound with runic shackles, Malgareth’s Warhammer seethes with an infernal glow that pulsates from deep within its core. The surface is marred by molten veins, each one a reminder of the unyielding wrath that once coursed through its original wielder: Malgareth, the Tyrant of Embers. Some say the hammer resonates with the echoes of his final battle cries, driving fear and dread into the hearts of those who oppose it.

DA_CrimsonEverbloom.short_description: A rare, blood-red flower coveted for its potent alchemical properties.
DA_CrimsonEverbloom.long_description: With petals resembling shimmering, crimson silk, the Crimson Everbloom thrives in the most unlikely locations—its presence rumored to be a portent of both tragedy and renewed hope. Alchemists prize this flower for the strong life-energy locked within its fibers, which can be extracted and refined into powerful restoratives or poison cures. When gently bruised, the petals weep droplets of viscous sap that have an uncanny, almost heartbeat-like pulse, hinting at the flower’s mysterious origin.
DA_CrimsonEverbloom.discovery_description: Can be spotted in the depths of overgrown ruins.
DA_CrimsonEverbloom.on_use_description: Instantly restores 30% of max health and increases spell power by 20% for 60 seconds.

DA_Cube.long_description: The Cube’s perfectly symmetrical faces are etched with cryptic symbols that defy logical interpretation. Rumored to be shaped by an otherworldly craftsman, it hums with a subtle vibration that seems to warp the space around it. Countless sorcerers and inquisitive minds alike have sought to unravel its secrets, yet the Cube’s true purpose remains enshrouded in mystery—its silent form whispering possibilities of infinite potential and doom.
DA_Cube.on_use_description: Does literally nothing. Useless piece of shit.

DA_ExampleArmor.short_description: A plain yet reliable breastplate fashioned from polished brass.
DA_ExampleArmor.long_description: Hand-forged from solid brass, this armor offers dependable protection against common threats. Its surface, once gleaming, soon dulls with repeated exposure to the elements and the rigors of combat. Though lacking ornate engravings or arcane enhancements, its unadorned sturdiness has saved countless soldiers from brutal endings on the battlefield.

DA_ExampleArmor02.short_description: A finely crafted steel breastplate with subtle golden trim and a graceful, contoured design.
DA_ExampleArmor02.long_description: Smiths of a bygone dynasty fashioned this armor from tempered steel, its surface polished to a faint mirror sheen and accented with delicately worked gold filigree. The plating is designed to fit snugly while allowing a surprising range of motion, a testament to the artisan’s skill. Though bearing signs of age - minor dents, faint tarnish, and discoloration - the cuirass still retains a regal charm reminiscent of proud knights once sworn to lost kingdoms.

DA_ExampleBracers.short_description: Sturdy forearm guards adorned with delicate golden inlays.
DA_ExampleBracers.long_description: Fashioned alongside the famed Gilded Aegis Plate, these bracers boast tempered steel construction reinforced by finely wrought gilt accents. They are shaped to provide a snug, comfortable fit—protecting the wrists and forearms from glancing blows without hindering dexterity. Once a symbol of a proud order of knights, the faint tarnish on these bracers speaks to both their storied past and unyielding durability.

DA_ExampleGreaves.short_description: Ornately crafted leg armor offering balanced mobility and defense.
DA_ExampleGreaves.long_description: These greaves continue the unmistakable design of the Gilded Aegis set: steel plates expertly contoured to protect the wearer’s shins and knees, embellished with subtle lines of gilded filigree. Each section locks seamlessly into the next, granting support without encumbering movement. Legends say that those who marched to battle in a full Aegis set could withstand a cavalry charge, braced by the synergy of fine craftsmanship and time-honored tradition.

DA_ExampleHat.short_description: A wide-brimmed black hat, favored by elusive hunters and roving swordsmen.
DA_ExampleHat.long_description: Crafted from supple, weather-resistant material, the Dark Wanderer’s Hat features a broad brim that casts a deep shadow over the wearer’s face. Strips of charcoal-grey trim encircle its crown, hinting at a past life of polished elegance now dulled by wind, rain, and the rigors of the open road. Legends speak of lone mercenaries roaming bleak frontiers, kept anonymous beneath this unassuming headgear, gliding unseen across the landscape as if guided by a quiet, relentless purpose.

DA_ExampleHelmet.short_description: A regal helmet crowned with elegant golden trim, completing the Gilded Aegis ensemble.
DA_ExampleHelmet.long_description: Topping off the set is the Gilded Aegis Helm—crafted with smooth, curved contours that deflect incoming blows. Its subtly flared visor and crested ridges evoke the image of a proud knight poised for battle. Traces of gilding at the edges and along the temples reflect a warm glow in torchlight, though slight blemishes hint at the helm’s long history in pitched conflicts.

DA_ExampleTalisman.short_description: An eerie token carved in the likeness of a skull, rumored to harbor restless spirits.
DA_ExampleTalisman.long_description: This small, bone-white charm features a skull motif etched with unsettling precision. Sharp fangs extend from the lower jaw, hinting at a cruel past steeped in forbidden rites. Scholars debate whether the talisman was meant to ward off evil or beckon it closer, as those who carry it speak of hushed whispers scratching at the edge of their consciousness. Regardless of its origins, few deny the subtle aura of dread it radiates - an unspoken reminder of the thin boundary between life and death.

DA_Greatsword.short_description: A massive, rectangular blade tinged with otherworldly darkness, rumored to feast upon the essence of those it cuts down.
DA_Greatsword.long_description: The Abyssal Cleaver is a towering slab of dull steel, its broad face bearing a faint, smokey sheen. A single crimson eye-like gem pierces the center of its twisted black guard, pulsing in sync with the wielder’s heartbeat. Subtle runic etchings trace along the blade’s spine, half-buried by the dark corrosion spreading from the gem. Wielded in battle, it emits a low, throbbing hum - as though the blade itself lusts for violent conquest. Legends claim that with each life claimed, the Cleaver’s malignant power grows, slowly warping its bearer’s soul.

DA_HealthFlask.short_description: A small steel container of restorative essence that instantly replenishes 40% of one’s maximum health.
DA_HealthFlask.long_description: Fashioned from dull, tarnished metal etched with faint runes, this modest flask holds a crimson tincture that pulses with vitality. Its origins remain a mystery - some say it was brewed by hermetic healers, others claim it was distilled from the blood of ancient beasts. Regardless of its true nature, the liquid’s power to mend mortal wounds has proven indispensable to those who wander perilous lands.
DA_HealthFlask.on_use_description: Replenishes 40% of your health instantly, swiftly mending wounds.

DA_Katana.short_description: A sleek and refined katana with a deep, dark finish.
DA_Katana.long_description: Midnight Steel is a katana renowned for its striking appearance and flawless construction. The blade is forged from high-carbon steel, resulting in a deep, matte black finish that exudes sophistication and strength. The minimalist design emphasizes clean lines and a perfect balance, making it as functional as it is visually appealing. The handle is wrapped in black leather, complemented by a simple, yet sturdy tsuba. Midnight Steel is favored by warriors who appreciate understated elegance and superior craftsmanship.

DA_Lantern.short_description: A one-time-use pocket lantern that lasts for 60 seconds.
DA_Lantern.long_description: This small, convenient lantern can be clipped to a belt or pocket. It provides light for a short duration, making it perfect for brief explorations in the dark. Once activated, it emits a steady glow for 60 seconds before expiring.
DA_Lantern.on_use_description: The lantern lights up, casting a warm glow around you for 60 seconds before it fades.

DA_PoisonSword.short_description: A cursed blade that drips with venom, delivering poison with every strike.
DA_PoisonSword.long_description:
The blade known as Venomfang, was forged in the depths of a toxic swamp. The hilt is laced with green veins of an unknown material that oozes poison, making it a lethal weapon for those skilled enough to wield it. 

Each strike inflicts a virulent toxin upon foes, slowly draining their life away. A weapon of dread, it is said to have claimed countless lives, leaving behind a trail of withered corpses.

DA_PrisonKey.short_description: A heavily rusted iron key used to lock and unlock the cells deep within a fortress of despair.
DA_PrisonKey.long_description: Fashioned from crude, unyielding metal and scarred by years of harsh usage, this key has seen countless prisoners fade away behind iron bars. The dark patina on its bow seems ingrained with the echoing screams of those who once rattled their chains in despair. In your hand, it carries a quiet weight - both a tangible lockpick to forbidden corridors and a silent testament to cruelties endured within.

DA_Shield01.short_description: A shield imbued with the power of everlasting fire.
DA_Shield01.long_description:
The Aegis of the Eternal Flame is a masterfully crafted shield, forged in the heart of a sacred forge where mortal and divine hands once worked together. Its surface is adorned with swirling, golden patterns that seem to move like flickering flames when touched by light. 

The shield’s core is embedded with an opalescent gem that holds the essence of an eternal fire, providing both warmth and an intimidating aura. It is said that this shield was once wielded by a legendary guardian who could deflect not only physical attacks but also the darkest of curses, channeling the power of fire to protect and destroy.

DA_Sword01.short_description: A shapened sword imbued with the strength of a legendary beast.
DA_Sword01.long_description:
Forged from the bones of the ancient Behemoth, this sword is a relic of a time when titanic beasts roamed the land. The blade is massive, nearly as tall as the warrior who dares to wield it, and crackles with raw, untamed energy. Its surface is etched with intricate runes that glow faintly in the dark, whispering of a power long sealed within the creature's essence.

When swung, the sword channels the Behemoth’s rage, shaking the earth with each strike. Only those with immense strength and unwavering resolve can control its destructive force, as the blade seems almost alive, yearning for battle.

DA_Sword02.short_description: A cursed blade that feeds on the souls of the fallen.
DA_Sword02.long_description:
Forged in the depths of an abyssal forge, the Darkened Soulslasher is a weapon of malevolent intent. Its blade is unnaturally dark, absorbing light rather than reflecting it, and its edge is jagged as if torn from the fabric of shadow itself. The sword is said to be cursed, whispering in an ancient tongue only the damned can understand, craving the essence of the fallen. Each swing seems to grow heavier, hungrier, as though it feeds upon the despair of its wielder.

Those who wield this weapon are granted great power, but they must be wary—for it is said that the Soulslasher does not merely take life, but consumes the very soul of those it strikes, slowly corrupting its bearer with each kill.

DA_ThrowingKnife.short_description: A lightweight, fast-throwing weapon for ranged attacks.
DA_ThrowingKnife.long_description:
A finely honed knife, balanced for precision throwing. Used by those who walk the shadowed paths, preferring silent strikes over brute force.
Though its damage is meager, its true value lies in disrupting foes and creating opportunities in battle.

Forged from tempered steel and often coated in toxin or ash, these knives find their way into the hands of mercenaries and desperate wanderers alike. Lightweight yet deadly in skilled hands.
DA_ThrowingKnife.on_use_description: Quickly hurls the knife at an enemy, dealing minor damage but staggering lesser foes. Ideal for whittling down enemies or drawing their attention from afar.
